text: The flag of Pamplona () is colored green and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the with of the center. The ratio of the flag is 2:4. == Other flags == Image:Pendón de Pamplona (según el privilegio de la unión) con cadenas.svg|Flag of Pamplona (1423). Image:Bandera de Pamplona (antigua)3.svg|Flag of Pamplona (1923). ==References== Pamplona Pamplona Category:Pamplona Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Pamplona
